markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Liberating Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=580)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Ranginori](/Deities.aspx?ID=106), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=127)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33), it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).
name: Liberating Command

summary_markdown: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.
text: Liberating Command Source Gods & Magic pg. 108 2.0 Tradition Occult Deities Ranginori, Shei Cast Single Action verbal Range 60 feet Target 1 creature --- You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is grabbed, immobilized, or restrained, it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to Escape.
